column4: ok, guys, I am running out of ideas for what to do about compiz and window borders.  compiz seems to load but i am left without window borders on my x61, intel 965 graphics.  i checked the window decoration plugin and it's got right line there...
any pointers?
what line is there?
/usr/bin/compiz-decorator
yeah that is the right line, try /usr/bin/compiz-decorator --replace
just put that line in and then uncheck the window decoration and check it again
nothin' it does nothing..
only other guess I have is try using emerald window manager instead of the compiz one
got it installed, tried emerald --replace as well
do you have a theme picked in the emerald manager?
still no borders..
i think i tired to pick theme and it closes the emerald manager
thinking
your using a nvidia card right?
intel 965 on lenovo x61 upgrade from karmic, where compiz worked fine
look at this link has something about same problem your having no window borders, compiz or emerald. An exception was thrown by the type initializer for Tomboy.TomboyDBus ---> System.Exception: U
sorry wrong paste lol. http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=983544
i can do glxgears and compiz-check says all ok
it sounds like your xorg.conf needs to be tweaked, read that post it says what to do.
applied tweaks... rebooting...
good luck
we'll see how it goes
